article.description: Hyder scores 23, leads Southern U over Prairie View 77-73
article.headline: Hyder scores 23, leads Southern U over Prairie View 77-73
article.linkText: Hyder scores 23, leads Southern U over Prairie View 77-73
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Christopher Hyder scored 23 points and grabbed 10 rebounds, both career-highs, to lead Southern University to a 77-73 victory over Prairie View on Thursday night. Southern (16-15, 13-4 Southwestern Athletic Conference) has won two-straight and five of its last six games, and remains tied with Alabama State (17-9, 13-4) for second place in the conference. The Jaguars travel to SWAC leader Texas Southern in the regular season finale on Saturday night. Prairie View led 44-31 at the half, and stretched it to 15 points in the second before the Jaguars used a 40-21 run in the final 14:00 to pull out the win. Trelun Banks had 17 points, Tre Lynch 11 and Adrian Rodgers chipped in 10 for Southern. Tre Hagood scored 32 points on 13-of-25 shooting, and Montrael Scott had 13 to lead Prairie View (13-17, 11-6).

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
